description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[Annals of Philadelphia, being a collection of memoirs, anecdotes, and incidents of the city and its inhabitants, from the days of the Pilgrim founders ... To which is added an appendix, containing olden time researches and reminiscences of New York City.]" Author: WATSON, John Fanning. Contributor: HAZARD, Willis P. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10413.k.3." Page: 53 Place of Publishing: Philadelphia Date of Publishing: 1844 Edition: [Another edition.] Annals of Philadelphia and Pennsylvania, in the olden time, etc. (Enlarged with many revisions and additions by W. P. Hazard, etc.). Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003864442 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
